St._Clair_Shores.Eastland Center: Eastland Center is an enclosed shopping mall located in the city of Harper Woods, an inner-ring suburb of Detroit, Michigan, United States. Opened in 1957, the mall has been expanded several times since. It currently features over 88 stores, as well as a small food court, with Shoppers World, Target (is closing February 3, 2018) and Burlington Coat Factory serving as anchor stores.
